inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| summarize No_of_Requests = dcount(id) by name

inputs.name: PartSubTitle
inputs.value: Number of requests per API endpoint

inputs.name: PartSubTitle
inputs.value: Average response time per API endpoint

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
requests
| summarize failedRequests = countif(substring(resultCode, 0, 1) == '5'), totalRequests=count() 
| extend reliability= strcat((totalRequests - failedRequests)/todecimal(totalRequests) * 100, "%")

inputs.name: Query
inputs.value:
let scanExecutionTargetTime = 30;
customEvents
| where name == "ScanTaskCompleted"
| extend scanExecutionTime = todouble(customMeasurements.scanExecutionTime)
| summarize meet_target=countif(scanExecutionTime <= scanExecutionTargetTime) , total=count()
| extend performance=strcat(round(meet_target/todecimal(total) * 100, 2), "%")
